snippet.title: Nintendo DS Longplay - Build-A-Bear Workshop Part.1
snippet.description:
https://www.alloflongplayshd.com/

Build-A-Bear Workshop is a simulation video game for the Nintendo DS based on the retailer of the same name. It was developed by French company Neko Entertainment and published by The Game Factory for release on November 5, 2007.
